text:
Juvenile Myelomonocytic Leukemia
																                    Treatment of juvenile myelomonocytic leukemia (JMML) may include the following:         -  Combination chemotherapy followed by stem cell transplant. If JMML recurs after stem cell transplant, a second stem cell transplant may be done.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with juvenile myelomonocytic leukemia. For more specific results, refine the search b
